about_the_game:
Welcome to Overhills - a world where Slavic folklore comes to life and invites you on a breathtaking journey of exploration and discovery.

  • Explore a living, breathing world: Traverse an open world rich in diverse biomes, each brimming with secrets waiting to be uncovered. Our unique blend of fixed landscapes and procedurally generated content ensures that every adventure is full of surprises. Unearth hidden artifacts, encounter mythical creatures, and interact with intriguing NPCs, all seamlessly woven into a world deeply rooted in Slavic lore.

  • Engage in dynamic combat: Prepare for combat that's as fluid as it is exciting. The combat system is designed to be accessible yet challenging, rewarding skill and strategy.

  • Craft your own path: With our innovative non-linear crafting system, you don't just follow recipes, you create them. Experiment with different materials to forge powerful tools, weapons, and artifacts. Alchemy and cooking are your playgrounds for experimentation, each with its own magical surprises.

  • Survive with strategy, not stress: Survival mechanics are designed to enhance your journey, not hinder it. Food and warmth provide beneficial buffs that allow you to focus more on exploration than mere survival.

  • Immerse Yourself in Story and Style: Every aspect of our game, from the hauntingly beautiful art style to the compelling story, is designed to immerse you in a world where folklore and fantasy blend seamlessly. The atmospheric setting is not just a backdrop, but a character in its own right, enriching every encounter and quest.

Your journey through our mystical world is one of constant discovery, challenge, and wonder. Are you ready to enter a realm where myths come alive and every path leads to a new story?
